thread.title: Satyajit Samrendra

author: Satyajit Samrendra
title: Satyajit Samrendra
text:
My wife came in touch with Jagriti over Facebook because she wanted to book air ticket for three of us. After that I talked to Jagriti couple of times before finally making decision. I want to say that Jagriti is full of energy and highly professional. She presented all options in front of me and helped me in choosing the most cost effective option which best worked d as per my very stringent timeline requirement.
She is excellent in follow-up and communication. You will love to work with her.
